04e800a6-4ff4-4472-a09a-dd83fee52872.description: Learners can demonstrate the knowledge required to interpret and present data in a meaningful and effective way to support organisational goals, including developing a best practice data security strategy. They can successfully evaluate and compare data visualisation tools and develop appropriate data visualisation reports in the context of an organisation’s strategic goal. They have the capability to examine and apply data analytics results to inform an organisation’s decision making.
04e800a6-4ff4-4472-a09a-dd83fee52872.name: Data Interpretation and Visualisation

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Data Interpretation and Visualisation assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Data Interpretation and Visualisation 20-hour self-paced course.
Successfully complete a one-hour assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

66041f24-ca56-4036-97d5-a65610a48e8b.description: Learners can identify and evaluate big data from multiple sources and form financial and business insights. They can develop data models to support management decision making and design a data strategy in the context of an organisations strategic goals.
66041f24-ca56-4036-97d5-a65610a48e8b.name: Data Analytics

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Data Analytics assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Data Analytics 20-hour self-paced course.
Successfully complete a one-hour assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

2f5d16ce-766a-4682-b0ea-87844ab8eb3e.description: Learners can demonstrate an understanding of the current finance landscape and what the future might look like with digital transformation in the finance ecosystem. They have developed the competencies with regards to the application of digital transformation and emerging technologies, as well as identifying the needs of digital finance in various business landscapes. They have the capability to evaluate how finance information systems can improve the effectiveness of management decision making.
2f5d16ce-766a-4682-b0ea-87844ab8eb3e.name: The Digital Finance Ecosystem

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Digital Finance Ecosystem assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Digital Finance Ecosystem 20-hour self-paced course.
Successfully complete a one-hour assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

7fa064d1-94bf-4119-8014-81f1909e7b9f.description: Learners can evaluate the benefits and risks of digital currency, cryptocurrencies and payments in the context of achieving an organisations strategic goals. They can examine the use of block-chain to create efficiencies and effectiveness in an organisation. Learners have the capability to evaluate the role of alternative finance providers and have the knowledge required to understand the future of money.
7fa064d1-94bf-4119-8014-81f1909e7b9f.name: Future of Money

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Future of Money assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Future of Money 20-hour self-paced course.
Successfully complete a one-hour assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

e53b1e3f-2b00-4502-b1c0-e4eff872d7f0.description: Learners can examine the use of AI, Machine Learning and Robotic Process Automation to create efficiencies and effectiveness in an organisation. They can evaluate the use of new technologies and tools to manage business risk and analyse the application and strategic impact. Learners have the capability to apply these tools and technologies in AI, Machine Learning and Robotic Process Automation to create innovative business solutions.
e53b1e3f-2b00-4502-b1c0-e4eff872d7f0.name: Technology and its use in Finance

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Technology and its use in Finance assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Technology and its use in Finance 20-hour self-paced course.
Successfully complete a one-hour assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

feed8571-2ad9-42d1-809a-67d7c08ce622.description: Learners can collaborate with stakeholders and recommend best practice risk management of digital security and data privacy. They have the capability to develop and apply compliance and governance frameworks taking into consideration existing, new and amended policies and regulation. Learners can assess the value of information assets and threats in todays business environments as well as evaluate regulation technology options for improvement of compliance and regulatory reporting in finance.
feed8571-2ad9-42d1-809a-67d7c08ce622.name: Risk Management, Governance and Regulation

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Risk Management, Governance and Regulation assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Risk Management, Governance and Regulation 20-hour self-paced course.
Successfully complete a one-hour assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

a47da1df-9cb9-462d-bf05-3281c04d9188.description: Learners understand the evolution and impact of a focus on sustainability on an organisation through a lens of environmental, social and governance concerns. They can assess the impacts on the organisation through applying materiality, utilise appropriate frameworks and provide guidance on external reporting considerations.
a47da1df-9cb9-462d-bf05-3281c04d9188.name: Creating Value Through Sustainability

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Creating Value through Sustainability micro-credential is the equivalence of an undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a one-hour online assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

0d365340-4d9a-44a2-98d4-9c2cae2e0d53.description: Learners possess active listening and questioning techniques for use with a range of stakeholders. Adept at influencing and negotiating with business leaders, they value cultural nuance, difference of opinions and understand underlying motivations.
0d365340-4d9a-44a2-98d4-9c2cae2e0d53.name: Strategic Communication and Influence

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Strategic Communication and Influence micro-credential is the equivalence of an undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a one-hour online assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

240b3949-949b-4b60-8ca3-33734d2046c6.description: Learners can capably quantify the magnitude and impact of change in the macro environment on strategy development and execution and an organisation’s business model. Scenario modelling and stress testing for a range of future states, they adapt performance management frameworks and budgeting to align the organisation for success.
240b3949-949b-4b60-8ca3-33734d2046c6.name: Financial Leadership in a Volatile World

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Financial Leadership in a Volatile World assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a one-hour online assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level

748376f3-6081-4637-9907-189f68d46531.description: Learners can demonstrate skills in managing employee performance and evaluating employee progress against set goals. They have the capability to successfully lead and engage employees through use of emotional intelligence, upholding a positive culture and providing an inspiring vision. Learners can identify and form productive and motivated teams, with strong collaboration skills across cultural and geographical borders and can also recognise, support and retain good talent.
748376f3-6081-4637-9907-189f68d46531.name: Leading People and Performance

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Leading People and Performance assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a one-hour online assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

36843dbe-32b8-498d-a64b-e2e57f7c461a.description: Learners can successfully advocate for the introduction of organisational cash-focussed thinking using practical cash flow management tools and techniques. Adept at identifying ways to empower the broader finance function, they can define and implement cash focussed KPIs to aid in performance management.
36843dbe-32b8-498d-a64b-e2e57f7c461a.name: Strategic Cash Flow Management

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Strategic Cash Flow Management assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a one-hour online assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level

79be3117-8715-45b1-a9dc-28915dbcb172.description: Learners understand how organisations produce and safeguard value during times of uncertainty, with a focus on cost efficiency, developing resilient supply chains and adapting an organisation’s pricing policies. With a broad stakeholder focus, learners can discuss the impact of sustainability reporting on creating growth and safeguarding value.
79be3117-8715-45b1-a9dc-28915dbcb172.name: Value Preservation and Creation

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Value Preservation and Creation assessment is the equivalent of an undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a one-hour online assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level

628c73f5-394c-4aa0-8516-c93a0d8bf50a.description: Learners can demonstrate skills in negotiating, influencing decisions, and creating customer success through impactful communication. They have knowledge of writing and presentation strategies, sustaining customer satisfaction and how to build workplace relationships, including conflict resolution.
628c73f5-394c-4aa0-8516-c93a0d8bf50a.name: Business Management Professional

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Business Management Professional assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a one-hour online assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

7754d18d-99f7-4b46-908b-9032e19aa4aa.description: Learners can demonstrate skills in leading strategy, change and innovation, and improving performance. They understand how to form goals and execute plans that are aligned to the corporate strategy. Learners are able to identify opportunities for innovation and achieve competitive advantage by taking business-appropriate risks. They have also developed project management skills and ability to implement successful change initiatives.
7754d18d-99f7-4b46-908b-9032e19aa4aa.name: Strategic Leadership

alignments.name: Proficient
alignments.description: The Strategic Leadership assessment is the equivalence of a undergraduate subject level and is at the Proficient level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a one-hour online assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

177d26a9-8abe-4aba-a648-ef3251fa76fd.description: Learners can develop and execute a marketing plan and implement contemporary business operating systems that support business strategy and compliance. They are capable of developing a workforce to support the business strategy, and managing that workforce towards the achievement of business goals.
177d26a9-8abe-4aba-a648-ef3251fa76fd.name: Business Advisory - Process and People

alignments.name: Mastery
alignments.description: The Business Advisory: Process and People assessment is the equivalence of a postgraduate subject level and is at the Mastery level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a one-hour online assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

9aaad5a3-f790-478d-bc86-844fd0b51e88.description: Learners demonstrate ability to synthesise, assess, and utilise skills in digital finance ecosystems, digital currency, data interpretation and visualisation, data analytics, and can support with best practice risk management and governance frameworks and policies. They have the capability to implement digital technologies and solutions to support financial decisions. Learners can design requirements for a data strategy including the use of big data and data analytics to solve data issues.
9aaad5a3-f790-478d-bc86-844fd0b51e88.name: Digital Finance Digital Certificate

alignments.name: Mastery
alignments.description: The Digital Finance Digital Certificate assessment is the equivalence of a postgraduate subject level and is at the Mastery level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the required Digital Finance Digital Certificate content, achieved through 120-hours of self-paced learning.

Demonstrate an understanding of the learning objectives through the successful completion of an assessment, conducted under exam conditions and at a standard commensurate with postgraduate tertiary level.

c6a4370d-5389-4632-b9ac-d0d752021dda.description: Learners can develop plans to start, grow and exit a business, as well as develop strategies and operational plans. They are capable of managing capital and operational funding requirements, along with the financial performance of a business. They understand how to lead change and build business adaptability.
c6a4370d-5389-4632-b9ac-d0d752021dda.name: Business Advisory - Business Strategy

alignments.name: Mastery
alignments.description: The Business Advisory: Business Strategy assessment is the equivalence of a postgraduate subject level and is at the Mastery level on our Accounting and Finance Capability Framework.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a one-hour online assessment, conducted under exam conditions, at a standard commensurate with credit level or higher at the corresponding tertiary level.

skills.name: Manages a practice or business effectively and efficiently.
